content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_empty_space height=”64px”]

Educational Stages

In order to memorize the Holy Quran, the department of the Holy Quran has been divided into four departments
[vc_empty_space height=”64px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” margin_top=”5″ margin_bottom=”10″ type=”vc_default” css=”.vc_custom_1609272660986{margin-right: 50px !important;margin-bottom: 10px !important;margin-left: 50px !important;background-image: url(https://besttechglobal.com/projects/marif/wp-content/uploads/2019/11/bg-vector-2-1.png?id=541) !important;background-position: 0 0 !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1609272514815{margin-left: 50px !important;background-image: url(https://besttechglobal.com/projects/marif/wp-content/uploads/2019/11/bg-vector-2-3.png?id=543) !important;background-position: 0 0 !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;}”]

Department of Qaeda

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1609199573552{padding-top: 30px !important;}”]Department of Qaeda, under the supervision of Ma’arif-ul-Qur’an, has a great fame for its unique style of teaching. It takes approximately six months for a normal student to complete Qaeda with all its specific rules that are called “Tajweed Qawaid”, and they are frequently practiced with the help of whiteboard. After such practices, students become able to recite the Qur’an gracefully and expressively. Students who came from the seminaries go through the examination and sent to the department of Qaeda to improve themselves –if they are found a mistake in the rules of Qaeda. This procedure has always been found very useful and helpful.

Course Duration: Six months

Course: Al-Maarif Qaeda, Al-Maarif Islamiat, Al-Maarif calligraphy, Practical prayer practice

Required Ability: Complete letter of recognition, Fluent Reading[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1609249557154{margin-right: 50px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”2438″ img_size=”full” alignment=”right” style=”vc_box_outline” border_color=”green” css_animation=”slideInRight”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” margin_top=”5″ margin_bottom=”10″ type=”vc_default” css=”.vc_custom_1609249587951{margin-bottom: 10px !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1609249717469{margin-left: 50px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”2444″ img_size=”full” style=”vc_box_outline” border_color=”green” css_animation=”slideInLeft”][/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1609249605582{margin-right: 50px !important;}”]

Department of Nazra

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1609199423564{padding-top: 30px !important;}”]Nazra plays backbone for Hifz. A student needs to recite the Qur’an flawlessly or else Hifz-e-Qur’an will be difficult. Therefore, after completing Qaeda students learn Nazra up to three volumes of the Holy Qur’an, meanwhile, they acquire the ability to recite the entire Qur’an according to the rules of Tajweed. After that, they are sent to the Hifz class.

Course Duration: 6 months

Courses: Recitation of Qur’an from five easy parah for the purpose of Salah.

Requirement: Ability to recite the Holy Quran as per the rules of Tajweed.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” margin_top=”5″ margin_bottom=”10″ type=”vc_default” css=”.vc_custom_1609249674533{margin-bottom: 10px !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1609249684626{margin-left: 50px !important;}”]

Department of Hifz-e-Qur’an (Learning by Heart)

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1609200419027{padding-top: 30px !important;}”]One must be active, attentive, and passionate for Hifz-e-Qur’an. Teachers, students, guardians, and the institute play a vital role in this regard. A little carelessness from any one of them can become a big hurdle in achieving the required results. It is said, “the slightest negligence creates sever changes.

Ma’arif-ul-Qur’an has formulated an excellent educational program to achieve the best results and every student is closely monitored during this period. Daily, monthly, quarterly and annual reports are prepared. Quantity and quality of the lesson is always monitored. Special attention is given for having a good grip on previous memorized volumes of the Qur’an. As soon as the weakness in memorization comes to light, the causes are considered and prevented through mutual consultation and appropriate strategy”.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1609249693563{margin-right: 50px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”2446″ img_size=”full” alignment=”right” style=”vc_box_outline” border_color=”green” css_animation=”slideInRight”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” margin_top=”5″ margin_bottom=”10″ type=”vc_default” css=”.vc_custom_1609272847686{margin-bottom: 10px !important;background-position: 0 0 !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1609249798663{margin-left: 50px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”2448″ img_size=”full” style=”vc_box_outline” border_color=”green” css_animation=”slideInLeft”][/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1609272917226{margin-right: 50px !important;background-image: url(https://besttechglobal.com/projects/marif/wp-content/uploads/2019/11/bg-vector-3-1.png?id=544) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: contain !important;}”]

Department of Conjugation (GARDAAN)

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1609200667234{padding-top: 30px !important;}”]After memorization of the Quran it becomes necessary to repeat it over and over to modify the reciting skills. This process is called ‘Conjugation (Gardaan)”. Keeping in view the necessity and importance of Gardaan, a regular department has been set up in Ma’arif-ul-Qur’an where students revise the Qur’an repeatedly for a period of eight months to one year. During this process, full attention is paid to Tajweed and tone of voice. The annual exams of this department are held under Wifaq-ul-Madaris-al-Arabia Pakistan. Students of this department participate in competitions held on national level. They are specially prepared for this and our students have won many awards in these competitions.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content” full_height=”yes” equal_height=”yes” rtl_reverse=”yes” bg_type=”image” parallax_style=”vcpb-vz-jquery” bg_image_new=”id^15837|url^https://almaarif.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/Idara-Maarif-Docu-for-Mobile-025.jpg|caption^null|alt^null|title^Idara Maarif Docu for Mobile 025|description^null” bg_image_repeat=”no-repeat” bg_img_attach=”fixed” enable_overlay=”enable_overlay_value” overlay_color=”#000000″ overlay_pattern=”01.png” overlay_pattern_opacity=”90″ overlay_pattern_attachment=”fixed” css=”.vc_custom_1617813451444{padding-top: 6% !important;background-color: #000000 !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″]

Highlighted Features

LIMITED SEATS IN THE CLASS:

For the provision of the required attention to every individual.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle”][vc_column_inner width=”2/5″ css=”.vc_custom_1609116831363{margin-left: 10px !important;}”][vc_empty_space height=”64px”]

SUPERVISOR:

Pays full attention to every student in the class and repeat the performance of every individual to the managing committee.

COMPUTERIZED RECORD:

Compiled a complete academic record of each student so that their parents are fully aware of their children’s performance through our website almaarif.org.

QUICK NOTE:

Parents are notified by a notice, in case of any weakness in lesson.

MUTUAL CONSULTATION:

After every quarterly examination, the dean has a mutual consultation meeting with the teachers about every individual. They try to solve the problems which seems to be the reason for the weakness in students.
[vc_empty_space height=”64px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/5″ css=”.vc_custom_1609118174473{background-image: url(https://besttechglobal.com/projects/marif/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/aims-and-objectives-web.png?id=12794) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/5″][vc_empty_space height=”64px”]

REQUIRED ABILITY:

After completing the conjugation (Gardaan), students become able to recite the entire Quran in one go.

DIARY:

A diary is issued to track the performance of each student from morning to evening.

QIRAT:

Special attention is paid to Tajweed and accent. Students specially practice reciting the Quran in Arabic accent.

COMPETITIONS DURING SEMESTER:

Competitions are held in every 4 months among the classes of Department of Hifz-e-Qur’an in 5 volumes, 10 volumes, 15 volumes, 20 volumes to make conjugation (Gardaan) easier for Students.
[vc_empty_space height=”64px”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”top”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”15861″ img_size=”full”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”15862″ img_size=”full” alignment=”right”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”15863″ img_size=”full”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”15864″ img_size=”full” alignment=”right”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”15865″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/4″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″]
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″]

21. Students who memorized in short time period

Examination System

  1. DAILY PERFORMANCE REPORT: It provides the daily detailed report of students.
  2. MONTHLY REVIEW: These assessments are conducted to determine the excellence of
  3. QUARTERLY EXAMS: This examination is placed to examine the performances of students in previous four months.
  4. UNANNOUNCED REVIEWS: Each student’s conjugation can be reviewed at any time.

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” gap=”15″][vc_column_inner css=”.vc_custom_1609248155789{border: 5px double #b1650d !important;border-radius: 5px !important;}”]

Admission Plans

  • After years of experience, the teachers came to the conclusion that it is beneficial for the children to memorize Quran at an early age. Therefore, the institute Maarif-ul-Quran requires the child to be “6 years old” at the time of admission.
  • Only non-residents are admitted to institute Maarif-ul-Quran Paradise Homes.
  • Parents are also interviewed at the time of admission.
  • If the Pakistanis live in different countries wants their children to become Hafiz-e-Quran, the institute provides a hostel for them with all luxurious facilities.

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” gap=”15″][vc_column_inner css=”.vc_custom_1609248155789{border: 5px double #b1650d !important;border-radius: 5px !important;}”]

Admission Process

Take the following documents with you at the time of admission:

  1. Birth certificate certified by Nadra
  2. Passport size photo
  • Father’s / Guardian’s CNIC

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” gap=”15″][vc_column_inner css=”.vc_custom_1609248155789{border: 5px double #b1650d !important;border-radius: 5px !important;}”]

Educational Fee

Institute Maarif-ul-Quran is established to meeting the needs of religious and modern education of the urban children. So, the issues of fees in this institution are taken very seriously to ensure the payment on due date. Details of the payment of fees in Department of Hifz are given below:

Admission fees: Rs.3000

Monthly fees: Rs.2700

Note: Fees will increase by 10% every year.

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1609249225450{border: 5px double #b1650d !important;}”]

Transportation

Transportation is not the responsibility of the institute.

Fathers/Guardians are responsible for arranging transportation on their own.

However, the management of the institution will definitely help.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content” gap=”20″ disable_element=”yes” bg_type=”bg_color” ult_hide_row=”ult_hide_row_value” ult_hide_row_tablet=”tablet” ult_hide_row_tablet_small=”xs_tablet” ult_hide_row_mobile=”mobile” ult_hide_row_mobile_large=”xl_mobile” css=”.vc_custom_1611614124444{margin-top: 50px !important;margin-bottom: 50px !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” gap=”15″ css=”.vc_custom_1609248903073{margin-right: 50px !important;margin-left: 50px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1609248155789{border: 5px double #b1650d !important;border-radius: 5px !important;}”]

Examination System

  1. DAILY PERFORMANCE REPORT: It provides the daily detailed report of students.
  2. MONTHLY REVIEW: These assessments are conducted to determine the excellence of
  3. QUARTERLY EXAMS: This examination is placed to examine the performances of students in previous four months.
  4. UNANNOUNCED REVIEWS: Each student’s conjugation can be reviewed at any time.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1609248604626{border: 5px double #b1650d !important;border-radius: 5px !important;}”]

Admission Plans

  • After years of experience, the teachers came to the conclusion that it is beneficial for the children to memorize Quran at an early age. Therefore, the institute Maarif-ul-Quran requires the child to be “6 years old” at the time of admission.
  • Only non-residents are admitted to institute Maarif-ul-Quran Paradise Homes.
  • Parents are also interviewed at the time of admission.
  • If the Pakistanis live in different countries wants their children to become Hafiz-e-Quran, the institute provides a hostel for them with all luxurious facilities.

Admission Process

Take the following documents with you at the time of admission:

  1. Birth certificate certified by Nadra
  2. Passport size photo
  • Father’s / Guardian’s CNIC

Educational Fee

Institute Maarif-ul-Quran is established to meeting the needs of religious and modern education of the urban children. So, the issues of fees in this institution are taken very seriously to ensure the payment on due date. Details of the payment of fees in Department of Hifz are given below:

Students who came from the seminaries go through the examination and sent to the department of Qaeda to improve themselves –if they are found a mistake in the rules of Qaeda. This procedure has always been found very useful and helpful. Course Duration: Six months Course: Al-Maarif Qaeda, Al-Maarif Islamiat, Al-Maarif calligraphy, Practical prayer practice Required Ability: Complete letter of recognition, Fluent Reading[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1609249557154{margin-right: 50px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”2438″ img_size=”full” alignment=”right” style=”vc_box_outline” border_color=”green” css_animation=”slideInRight”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” margin_top=”5″ margin_bottom=”10″ type=”vc_default” css=”.vc_custom_1609249587951{margin-bottom: 10px !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1609249717469{margin-left: 50px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”2444″ img_size=”full” style=”vc_box_outline” border_color=”green” css_animation=”slideInLeft”][/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1609249605582{margin-right: 50px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1609199423564{padding-top: 30px !important;}”]Nazra plays backbone for Hifz. A student needs to recite the Qur’an flawlessly or else Hifz-e-Qur’an will be difficult. Therefore, after completing Qaeda students learn Nazra up to three volumes of the Holy Qur’an, meanwhile, they acquire the ability to recite the entire Qur’an according to the rules of Tajweed. After that, they are sent to the Hifz class. Course Duration: 6 months Courses: Recitation of Qur’an from five easy parah for the purpose of Salah. Requirement: Ability to recite the Holy Quran as per the rules of Tajweed.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” margin_top=”5″ margin_bottom=”10″ type=”vc_default” css=”.vc_custom_1609249674533{margin-bottom: 10px !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1609249684626{margin-left: 50px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1609200419027{padding-top: 30px !important;}”]One must be active, attentive, and passionate for Hifz-e-Qur’an.
